title: Independence Day Celebration
content: The school will celebrate Independence Day on 15th August with a cultural program, parade, and flag hoisting.

title: Mid-Term Exam Schedule Released
content: Mid-term exams will commence from 19th August. The detailed timetable is available on the school notice board and website.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
content: A PTM for all classes will be held on Saturday, 10th August to discuss student progress and address concerns.

title: School Mobile App Launched
content: Our new school app is now live! Download it from the Play Store or App Store to receive instant updates and homework.

title: Admission Open for 2025-26
content: Admissions are now open for Nursery to Class IX for the academic session 2025-26. Apply online or visit the school office.

title: Science Exhibition Success
content: Congratulations to all students who participated in the Science Exhibition. Top projects will be sent to the district level.

title: New Library Books Arrived
content: Over 300 new books have been added to the school library, including new fiction, science encyclopedias, and competitive prep material.
